decoworld.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.client.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the entry point for the gameplay interface.

      • sendToServer

        public void sendToServer(java.lang.Object o)
        Provides a method to send objects to the server. Note that you must have an instance of a client to send a message. An example use case could be Client client = Client.getInstance(); client.sendToServer(new ServerMessage(new ServerRequest()));
